Function for posting chart configurations.

post_config submits JSON configuration lists.

post_config(config, url = "http://stats.oecd.org", show = FALSE,
  path = NULL, response = FALSE, auto_unbox = TRUE, null = "null")

Arguments

config

a configuration list according to the API definition
url

the POST API endpoint
show

boolean print the created JSON object
path

write the JSON object to a file on disk
auto_unbox

automatically ‘unbox’ all atomic vectors of length 1 (see jsonlite::toJSON)
null

how to encode NULL values within a list: must be one of 'null' or 'list' (see jsonlite::toJSON)

Source

httr was created by Hadley Wickham, see https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/httr/index.html; jsonlite was created by Jeroen Ooms et al., see https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/jsonlite/index.html.

Examples

chartconfig <- jsonlite::read_json(path = "../examples/chartconfig.json")
#> Warning: cannot open file '../examples/chartconfig.json': No such file or directory
#> Error in open.connection(con, "rb"): cannot open the connection
chartUrl <- post_config(x = chartconfig)
#> Error in post_config(x = chartconfig): unused argument (x = chartconfig)
browseURL(url = chartUrl)
#> Error in browseURL(url = chartUrl): object 'chartUrl' not found

outfile <- tempfile(pattern = "chartconfig_", fileext = ".json")
post_config(x = chartconfig, show = TRUE, path = outfile)
#> Error in post_config(x = chartconfig, show = TRUE, path = outfile): unused argument (x = chartconfig)
jsonlite::read_json(path = outfile)
#> Warning: cannot open file '/tmp/Rtmpf1fE53/chartconfig_52891873cd4e.json': No such file or directory
#> Error in open.connection(con, "rb"): cannot open the connection

post_config(x = chartconfig, response=TRUE)
#> Error in post_config(x = chartconfig, response = TRUE): unused argument (x = chartconfig)
